data.lyric:
[ti:TRAGIC (Explicit)]
[ar:The Kid LAROI/Youngboy Never Broke Again/Internet Money]
[al:F*CK LOVE (SAVAGE) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]TRAGIC (Explicit) - The Kid LAROI/Youngboy Never Broke Again/Internet Money
[00:00.12]Lyrics by：Charlton Howard/Nico Baran/Cody Rounds/Danny Lee Snodgrass Jr./Kentrell DeSean Gaulden
[00:00.24]Composed by：Charlton Howard/Nico Baran/Cody Rounds/Danny Lee Snodgrass Jr./Kentrell DeSean Gaulden
[00:00.36]The Kid LAROI：
[00:00.37]Perfect
[00:06.53]Internet Money b***h hahahaha
[00:09.51]Yeah
[00:10.30]Yeah
[00:10.62]I remember times when I ain't have s**t
[00:13.49]No food in my crib now I live lavish
[00:15.48]Oh no-no-no
[00:16.12]They say they love me to my face but they can't stand it
[00:18.78]Them h*es ain't f**k with me back then now they attracted
[00:21.63]FN attached to my bro and he gon' blast it
[00:24.56]Don't tell me what I've been through you don't know
[00:26.88]Made it out the mud with or without you I'm good
[00:29.61]Did it for my lil' bro just to show him one day you could
[00:32.51]I did this for my mama 'cause I told her one day I would
[00:36.30]My life been tragic thank you for askin'
[00:39.11]I've seen too many of my fam' end up in caskets
[00:41.99]I've seen too many of my friends turn into ashes
[00:44.88]Wish I still had them
[00:46.58]Light a blunt put it to the sky I'm tryna get high
[00:49.23]High
[00:49.42]Know what's up look at me in my eyes tell me it's alright
[00:51.99]Alright
[00:52.29]Had to cut plenty people off money on my mind
[00:55.35]I can't f**k with 'em I can't trust nobody but I
[00:57.80]I remember times when I ain't have s**t
[00:59.71]Yeah
[00:59.96]No food in my crib now I live lavish
[01:02.38]They say they love me to my face but they can't stand it
[01:05.23]Them h*es ain't f**k with me back then now they attracted
[01:08.10]FN attached to my bro and he gon' blast it
[01:10.93]Don't tell me what I've been through you don't know
[01:13.41]Made it out the mud with or without you I'm good
[01:16.32]Did it for my lil' bro just to show him one day you could
[01:19.05]I did this for my mama 'cause I told her one day I would
[01:21.85]YoungBoy Never Broke Again：
[01:21.98]It was so bad-bad huh my money up they fake as f**k
[01:24.21]I know they mad-mad huh I still ain't done I ain't switchin' up
[01:27.17]I ain't givin' up I'm goin' in word to my friends
[01:29.98]I ain't thinking clear tell me what I did I just whipped the Benz
[01:32.94]I'd give it all back right now just to see you smile
[01:35.87]I give my h*es back on slime just to hear you now
[01:38.78]Ain't my friends ain't my woadie it ain't my dawg
[01:41.57]'Fraid to get some money be the only reason that they come around
[01:44.68]In the top down everythin' goin' smoothly
[01:47.56]Hope they don't try me come out on top I'm shootin' 'round
[01:50.71]But I'm a big time
[01:52.09]Haters after me but got so many of 'em for me
[01:54.93]Both：
[01:55.46]I remember times when I ain't have s**t
[01:57.49]Yeah
[01:58.15]No food in my crib now I live lavish
[02:00.32]Talk to me
[02:00.80]They say they love me to my face but they can't stand it
[02:03.45]Them h*es ain't f**k with me back then now they attracted
[02:06.35]FN attached to my bro and he gon' blast it
[02:09.08]Don't tell me what I've been through you don't know
[02:11.61]Made it out the mud with or without you I'm good
[02:14.31]Did it for my lil' bro just to show him one day you could
[02:17.24]I did this for my mama 'cause I told her one day I would
data.trans:
[ti:TRAGIC (Explicit)]
[ar:The Kid LAROI/Youngboy Never Broke Again/Internet Money]
[al:F*CK LOVE (SAVAGE) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.12]//
[00:00.24]//
[00:00.36]//
[00:00.37]Cxdy制作
[00:06.53]Internet Money 碧池
[00:09.51]//
[00:10.30]//
[00:10.62]我还记得我一无所有的时候
[00:13.49]家里没有裹腹的食物 现在我过着奢华的生活
[00:15.48]//
[00:16.12]他们当着我的面说爱我 但是他们忍无可忍
[00:18.78]这些妹子以前对我爱搭不理 现在却为我着迷
[00:21.63]我兄弟随身带着枪 他要大杀四方
[00:24.56]不要告诉我我经历的坎坷 你一无所知
[00:26.88]我白手起家 不管有没有你 我感觉良好
[00:29.61]为我的小兄弟做好表率 只是为了告诉他有志者事竟成
[00:32.51]我为我的妈妈全力以赴 因为我告诉过她 总有一天我会出人头地
[00:36.30]我的人生悲惨不已 谢谢你的关切
[00:39.11]我见过太多家人不幸地死去
[00:41.99]我见过太多朋友意外丧命
[00:44.88]多希望他们还在我身边
[00:46.58]点燃一根烟举向天空 我想让自己嗨起来
[00:49.23]嗨翻天
[00:49.42]你知道来龙去脉 看着我的眼睛 告诉我一切安好
[00:51.99]安然无恙
[00:52.29]不得不切断和许多人的联系 我只想着挣钱
[00:55.35]我不能跟他们厮混 除了我自己 我不相信任何人
[00:57.80]我还记得我一无所有的时候
[00:59.71]//
[00:59.96]家里没有裹腹的食物 现在我过着奢华的生活
[01:02.38]他们当着我的面说爱我 但是他们忍无可忍
[01:05.23]这些妹子以前对我爱搭不理 现在却为我着迷
[01:08.10]我兄弟随身带着枪 他要大杀四方
[01:10.93]不要告诉我我经历的坎坷 你一无所知
[01:13.41]我白手起家 不管有没有你 我感觉良好
[01:16.32]为我的小兄弟做好表率 只是为了告诉他有志者事竟成
[01:19.05]我为我的妈妈全力以赴 因为我告诉过她 总有一天我会出人头地
[01:21.85]//
[01:21.98]这真是糟糕透顶 我赚到盆满钵满 他们假到不行
[01:24.21]我知道他们怒火中烧 可我还没有满足 我不会轻易改变
[01:27.17]我永不言弃 我勇往直前 向我朋友保证
[01:29.98]我神志不清 告诉我的所做所为 我刚刚开着奔驰车狂飙
[01:32.94]现在我把一切都还给你 只是为了看见你的笑容
[01:35.87]我把妹子送回来 我发誓 只是为了洗耳恭听
[01:38.78]不是我的朋友 不是值得信赖的朋友 不是我的兄弟
[01:41.57]害怕掏钱 这是他们来找我的唯一理由
[01:44.68]自上而下 一切都顺风顺水
[01:47.56]希望他们不要挑衅我 我出类拔萃 我四处倾泻火力
[01:50.71]但是我所向披靡
[01:52.09]嫉妒我的人紧追不舍 但是我惹得这么多人眼红
[01:54.93]//
[01:55.46]我还记得我一无所有的时候
[01:57.49]//
[01:58.15]家里没有裹腹的食物 现在我过着奢华的生活
[02:00.32]跟我聊聊
[02:00.80]他们当着我的面说爱我 但是他们忍无可忍
[02:03.45]这些妹子以前对我爱搭不理 现在却为我着迷
[02:06.35]我兄弟随身带着枪 他要大杀四方
[02:09.08]不要告诉我我经历的坎坷 你一无所知
[02:11.61]我白手起家 不管有没有你 我感觉良好
[02:14.31]为我的小兄弟做好表率 只是为了告诉他有志者事竟成
[02:17.24]我为我的妈妈全力以赴 因为我告诉过她 总有一天我会出人头地
